name: Kudos Gold
description: "We are so pleased with this great new color for the KUDOS? Series - gold flowers in large compact spikes. The plants start blooming in late May and continue through the season. If they start looking a little tired, just shear them back and they will keep on blooming. Great form and longevity!"
comments: "Long days benefit overall plant vigor and flowering. Pinching at transplant is beneficial."
